text:
When Shadows Fall

Sonia's room, dimly lit, filled with tension  
Sonia: "Where is he? I can't bear this!"  

Dounia: "He'll come. He needs us."  

Sonia: "But what if he doesn't?"  

---  

Dounia waits anxiously in Raskolnikov's room  
Dounia: "He must come here first."  

Sonia (thinking): "What if he chooses despair?"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Sonia and Dounia anxiously await Raskolnikov, finding comfort in their bond as they fear for his well-being.
